data.meta_description: Wilsonville, Oregon schools including address and phone and website. Relocating or moving information for Wilsonville, Oregon.  Information includes: Wilsonville high schools, Wilsonville middle schools, Wilsonville grade and elementary schools, Wilsonville charter schools, Wilsonville public schools, and Wilsonville private schools
data.text:
Relocating to Wilsonville, Oregon - Schools

School finder: If you move to Wilsonville, Oregon here is a list of schools your kids could go to.

Wilsonville High Schools:

Wilsonville High School has consistently been one of the top three high schools in Oregon according to the Advanced Placement (AP) Challenge Index. 6800 S.W. Wilsonville Road | Wilsonville, Oregon 97070 | 503 673-7600

Wilsonville Middle Schools:

Inza R. Wood Middle School was built in 1980 and is adjacent to wetlands and a natural area with trails for field studies, cross country and community service. 11055 S.W. Wilsonville Road | Wilsonville, Oregon 97070 | 503 673-7500

Wilsonville Elementary Schools:

Boeckman Creek Primary School serves preK-5th grade and is home of the Bobcats.

6700 S.W. Wilsonville Road | Wilsonville, Oregon 97070 | 503 673-7750

Boones Ferry Primary School was built in 2001 and being surrounded by wetlands their mascot is the dragonfly.11495 S.W. Wilsonville Road | Wilsonville, Oregon 97070 | 503 673-7300
